float.name: Magnetism Friction
float.info: how much the crosshair slows over enemies

float.name: Magnetism Adhesion
float.info: how much the crosshair sticks over enemies

float.name: Inconsequential Target Scale
float.info: scales magnetism level for inconsequential targets like infection forms

float.name: Look Acceleration Time
float.info: time for a pegged look to reach maximum effect

float.name: Look Acceleration Scale
float.info: maximum effect of a pegged look (scales last value in the look function below)

float.name: Look Peg Threshold
float.info: magnitude of yaw for pegged acceleration to kick in

float.name: Look Auto-Leveling Scale
float.info: 1 is fast, 0 is none, over 1 is probably really fast

short.name: Minimum Weapon Swap Ticks
short.info: amount of time player needs to hold ACTION to pick up a weapon

short.name: Minimum Auto-Leveling Ticks
short.info: amount of time player needs to move without looking up/down before autoleveling kicks in

float.name: Minimum Angle for Vehicle Flipping
float.info: 0 means vehicle's up vector is along the ground, 90 means it's straight up

float.name: Scale
float.info: the end bounds of a chunk; beginning bounds of each is 1.0 รท total chunk count, times the chunk's number, starting with 0 and ending with 1

float.name: Health.Easy Enemy Damage

float.info: enemy damage multiplier on normal difficulty

float.info: enemy damage multiplier on hard difficulty

float.name: Health.Normal Infection Forms
float.info: toughness of infection forms (may be negative) on normal difficulty

float.info: toughness of infection forms (may be negative) on hard difficulty

float.info: toughness of infection forms (may be negative) on impossible difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Easy Rate of Fire
float.info: enemy rate of fire scale on easy difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Normal Rate of Fire
float.info: enemy rate of fire scale on normal difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Hard Rate of Fire
float.info: enemy rate of fire scale on hard difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Impossible Rate of Fire
float.info: enemy rate of fire scale on impossible difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Easy Projectile Error
float.info: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error, on easy difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Normal Projectile Error
float.info: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error, on normal difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Hard Projectile Error
float.info: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error, on hard difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Impossible Projectile Error
float.info: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error, on impossible difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Easy Burst Error
float.info: enemy burst error scale; reduces intra-shot distance; on easy difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Normal Burst Error
float.info: enemy burst error scale; reduces intra-shot distance; on normal difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Hard Burst Error
float.info: enemy burst error scale; reduces intra-shot distance; on hard difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Impossible Burst Error
float.info: enemy burst error scale; reduces intra-shot distance; on impossible difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Easy New Target Delay
float.info: enemy new-target delay scale factor on easy difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Normal New Target Delay
float.info: enemy new-target delay scale factor on normal difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Hard New Target Delay
float.info: enemy new-target delay scale factor on hard difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Impossible New Target Delay (enemy new-target delay scale factor on impossible difficulty)
Ranged Fire.Easy Burst Separation
float.info: delay time between bursts scale factors for enemies, on easy difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Normal Burst Separation
float.info: delay time between bursts scale factors for enemies, on normal difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Hard Burst Separation
float.info: delay time between bursts scale factors for enemies, on hard difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Impossible Burst Separation
float.info: delay time between bursts scale factors for enemies, on impossible difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Easy Target Tracking
float.info: additional target tracking fraction for enemies, on easy difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Normal Target Tracking
float.info: additional target tracking fraction for enemies, on normal difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Hard Target Tracking
float.info: additional target tracking fraction for enemies, on hard difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Impossible Target Tracking
float.info: additional target tracking fraction for enemies, on impossible difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Easy Target Leading
float.info: additional target leading fraction for enemies, on easy difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Normal Target Leading
float.info: additional target leading fraction for enemies, on normal difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Hard Target Leading
float.info: additional target leading fraction for enemies, on hard difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Impossible Target Leading
float.info: additional target leading fraction for enemies, on impossible difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Easy Overcharge Chance
float.info: overcharge chance scale fraction for enemies, on easy difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Normal Overcharge Chance
float.info: overcharge chance scale fraction for enemies, on normal difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Hard Overcharge Chance
float.info: overcharge chance scale fraction for enemies, on hard difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Impossible Overcharge Chance
float.info: overcharge chance scale fraction for enemies, on impossible difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Easy Special Fire Delay
float.info: delay between special-fire shots, like overcharge and banshee bombs, scale factor for enemies on easy difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Normal Special Fire Delay
float.info: delay between special-fire shots, like overcharge and banshee bombs, scale factor for enemies on normal difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Hard Special Fire Delay
float.info: delay between special-fire shots, like overcharge and banshee bombs, scale factor for enemies on hard difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Impossible Special Fire Delay
float.info: delay between special-fire shots, like overcharge and banshee bombs, scale factor for enemies on impossible difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Easy Guidance vs. Player
float.info: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player, on easy difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Normal Guidance vs. Player
float.info: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player, on normal difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Hard Guidance vs. Player
float.info: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player, on hard difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Impossible Guidance vs. Player
float.info: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player, on impossible difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Easy Melee Delay Base
float.info: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk, on easy difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Normal Melee Delay Base
float.info: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk, on normal difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Hard Melee Delay Base
float.info: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk, on hard difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Impossible Melee Delay Base
float.info: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk, on impossible difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Easy Melee Delay Scale
float.info: multiplier for all existing, non-berserk, melee delay times, on easy difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Normal Melee Delay Scale
float.info: multiplier for all existing, non-berserk, melee delay times, on normal difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Hard Melee Delay Scale
float.info: multiplier for all existing, non-berserk, melee delay times, on hard difficulty

float.name: Ranged Fire.Impossible Melee Delay Scale
float.info: multiplier for all existing, non-berserk, melee delay times, on impossible difficulty

float.name: Grenades.Easy Grenade Chance Scale (scale factor affecting decisions to throw a grenade on easy difficulty)
Grenades.Normal Grenade Chance Scale (scale factor affecting decisions to throw a grenade on normal difficulty)
Grenades.Hard Grenade Chance Scale (scale factor affecting decisions to throw a grenade on hard difficulty)
Grenades.Impossible Grenade Chance Scale (scale factor affecting decisions to throw a grenade on impossible difficulty)
Grenades.Easy Grenade Timer Scale (scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often) on easy difficulty)
Grenades.Normal Grenade Timer Scale (scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often) on normal difficulty)
Grenades.Hard Grenade Timer Scale (scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often) on hard difficulty)
Grenades.Impossible Grenade Timer Scale (scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often) on impossible difficulty)
Placement.Easy Major Upgrade (Normal)
float.info: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant on easy difficulty

float.name: Placement.Normal Major Upgrade (Normal)
float.info: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant on normal difficulty

float.name: Placement.Hard Major Upgrade (Normal)
float.info: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant on hard difficulty

float.name: Placement.Impossible Major Upgrade (Normal)
float.info: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant on impossible difficulty

float.name: Placement.Easy Major Upgrade (Few)
float.info: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal, on easy difficulty

float.name: Placement.Normal Major Upgrade (Few)
float.info: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal, on normal difficulty

float.name: Placement.Hard Major Upgrade (Few)
float.info: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal, on hard difficulty

float.name: Placement.Impossible Major Upgrade (Few)
float.info: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal, on impossible difficulty

float.name: Placement.Easy Major Upgrade (Many)
float.info: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many, on easy difficulty

float.name: Placement.Normal Major Upgrade (Many)
float.info: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many, on normal difficulty

float.name: Placement.Hard Major Upgrade (Many)
float.info: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many, on hard difficulty

float.name: Placement.Impossible Major Upgrade (Many)
float.info: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many, on impossible difficulty

float.name: Speed Multiplier
float.info: multiplayer only

float.name: Stun Movement Penalty
float.info: 1.0 prevents movement while stunned

float.name: Stun Turning Penalty
float.info: 1.0 prevents turning while stunned

float.name: Stun Jumping Penalty
float.info: 1.0 prevents jumping while stunned

float.name: Minimum Stun Time
float.info: all stunning damage will last at least this long

float.name: Maximum Stun Time
float.info: all stunning damage will last at most this long

float.name: Falling Damage Sensitivity
float.info: tested by 002. 0 = Death from TOUCHING the ground, 1 = No impact fall damage

float.name: Falling Distance Damage Modifier
float.info: tested by 002. 0 or less = Almost no falling impact damage, 0.21 = Normal, 0.5 = 2/3 shields lost from large falls, 1 = Twice as much damage as 0

float.name: Vehicle Terrain Parameters.Ground Friction Scale
float.info: fraction of original velocity parallel to the ground after one tick

float.name: Vehicle Terrain Parameters.Ground Friction Normal k1 Scale
float.info: cosine of angle at which friction falls off

float.name: Vehicle Terrain Parameters.Ground Friction Normal k0 Scale
float.info: cosine of angle at which friction is zero

float.name: Vehicle Terrain Parameters.Ground Depth Scale
float.info: depth in the ground at which a point mass rests

float.name: Vehicle Terrain Parameters.Ground Damp Fraction Scale
float.info: fraction of original velocity perpendicular to the ground after one tick

float.name: Velocity Scale: from
float.info: scales initial velocity

float.name: Velocity Scale: to
float.info: scales initial velocity

float.name: Radius: from
float.info: particle radius

float.name: Radius: to
float.info: particle radius
